CustomField.formula:
IF( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed") && (NOW() - ClosedDate) > 1),
IF( ISPICKVAL(Priority, "Urgent"), "üî• ", "" ) &
IF( Violated__c , "‚è±Ô∏è ", "" ) &
IF( OR(Account.ESS_Client__c, Account.STAMClient__c), "üì¢ ", "" ) &
IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(AssetId)), TEXT(Asset.Contract_Type__c) = "Diamond Care", Asset.UsageEndDate >= TODAY() ), "üíé ", "" ) &
IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed")), ISBLANK(OwnerId) || LEFT(OwnerId, 3) = "00G", FLOOR( (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) - ( FLOOR((TODAY() - DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) + WEEKDAY(DATE(1985,6,24))) / 7) * 2 + IF(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) = 1, 1, 0) + IF(WEEKDAY(TODAY()) = 7, 1, 0) ) ) >= 1 ), "‚ÄºÔ∏è ", IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed")), ISBLANK(OwnerId) || LEFT(OwnerId, 3) = "00G", AND( MOD(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)), 7) <> 0, MOD(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)), 7) <> 1 ), NOW() - CreatedDate > (8 / 24) ), "‚ùó", "" ) ) &
IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed")), ( (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Status_Last_Modified_Date__c)) - (FLOOR((TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Status_Last_Modified_Date__c) + WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Status_Last_Modified_Date__c))) / 7) * 2) - IF(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Status_Last_Modified_Date__c)) = 1, 1, 0) - IF(WEEKDAY(TODAY()) = 7, 1, 0) ) >= 20 ), "2Ô∏è‚É£0Ô∏è‚É£", IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed")), ( (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Status_Last_Modified_Date__c)) - (FLOOR((TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Status_Last_Modified_Date__c) + WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Status_Last_Modified_Date__c))) / 7) * 2) - IF(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Status_Last_Modified_Date__c)) = 1, 1, 0) - IF(WEEKDAY(TODAY()) = 7, 1, 0) ) >= 10 ), "üîü", IF( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status, "Closed")), TEXT(Status) <> "Client Idle", ( (TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Status_Last_Modified_Date__c)) - (FLOOR((TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Status_Last_Modified_Date__c) + WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Status_Last_Modified_Date__c))) / 7) * 2) - IF(WEEKDAY(DATEVALUE(Status_Last_Modified_Date__c)) = 1, 1, 0) - IF(WEEKDAY(TODAY()) = 7, 1, 0) ) >= 5 ), "5Ô∏è‚É£", "" ) ) ),
"" )
CustomField.label: Icons
